original_text:
What advice you have offered to one without wisdom!
    And what great insight you have displayed!
korean_text: 지혜 없는 자를 참 잘도 가르치는구나 큰 지식을 참 잘도 자랑하는구나

sentences.original_text: What advice you have offered to one without wisdom!
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜 없는 자에게 주신 어떤 조언이십니까!

sentences.original_text: And what great insight you have displayed!
